fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Taxation, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Areas followed primarily include financial services, taxation, trade and internal market.  
 
Key EU initiatives followed by the organisation include: Capital Markets Union, Banking Reform Package, New Prudential Regime for Investment Firms, Data Protection, Central Securities Depositories Regulation, European Market Infrastructure Regulation, Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive, Undertakings for the Collective Investment of Transferable Securities, and others.
organisation_name: The Bank of New York Mellon (BNY Mellon)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
BNY Mellon is a member of several industry associations including: 
 
•    Association for Financial Markets in Europe (AFME) - http://www.afme.eu/ 
 
•    European Fund and Asset Management Association (EFAMA) - http://www.efama.org/ 
 
•    European Banking Federation (EBF) - https://www.ebf-fbe.eu/ (indirect member through membership of national banking associations, e.g. UK Finance -  https://www.ukfinance.org.uk/; FEBELFIN - https://www.febelfin.be/; ABBL - http://www.abbl.lu/) 
 
•    Association of Global Custodians (AGC) - http://www.theagc.com/ 
 
•    EUROFI Financial Forum - http://www.eurofi.net/
relevant_communication: BNY Mellon responds to many invitations for comment, including consultation and discussion papers.
goals__remit:
BNY Mellon is a global investments company dedicated to helping its clients manage and service their financial assets throughout the investment lifecycle. 
 
BNY Mellon operates in Europe through:branches of The Bank of New York Mellon (a New York state chartered bank) and directly established and duly authorised subsidiaries established in certain EU jurisdictions and branches of those entities operating in several EU member states. 
 
Our principal lines of activity are investment services and investment management. 
 
For additional information, please refer to our website.
